dct_description_sm: Issued 1660. Asian strait is named D. de lesso. Quebec and S. Augustin are omitted.
Issued 1661. Asia is spelled ASIE. Quebec and S. Augustin now added
Issued in 1672, with coastline of Asia unnamed and altered. The Asian strait is now labeled D. de Vriez. With Azores and I. Cayene.
ca. 1687, with plate number 7 in lower righthand corner

Issued 1678. Entitled "AMERICA", without cartographer name and some spelling changes for German edition of Geographiae universalis. Asia labeled in upper left. Title cartouche of rectangle with scrollwork on exterior and interior, in place of cartographer's name.
Par P. DvVal Geogr. du Roy.

Issued in Le Monde Terrestre, Paris, 1660 Issued in: La g√©ographie universelle en plusieurs cartes, Paris, 1661. Issued in Le Monde ov la Geographie Universelle in 1663, 1670, 1672, 1676, 1677, 1682 and 1688.

California as an island with flat northern coast, but with Terre de Iesso nearly joining N. Mexiqve. Suggestion of D. d'Anien to north of California. Partial outline of N. Zelande and I. de Salomon. Title cartouche of simple rectangle and exterior scrollwork
